Name: The Sunset that day, あの日見た夕陽
About the game: English translations and BGM have been added! ※※　Due to grotesque expressions, under 18s cannot be purchased　※※ This is a completely original, full-color visual novel. More than 700 stills for the full version (more than 400 for the demo version). ※This work contains very extreme and grotesque language. There is no sexual content. Total play time is expected to be 8 hours (the demo version is about 5 hours). The background music is a sophisticated piece of music written by several excellent Japanese composers. From the first time you play, the game has a 'Start from any chapter' mode. Story. 　2020, Japan. Boring everyday. Uninspired days. The world is still as rotten as ever. 　I wish that everything would break down anyway. 　Even if I thought about that, I guess life would go on unchanged.
Developers: 誰かを思いやる心,Heart to care for someone
Publishers: 誰かを思いやる心,Heart to care for someone
